TrEd Extension: tiger (version 1.20)

TIGER Corpus

(generated documentation)

Description:

This package contains a conversion script for TIGER Corpus XML format to PML and a stylesheets for visualization of the resulting PML in TrEd.

Installation

This extension can be installed directly from TrEd, using Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Get New Extensions; just make sure the repository http://ufal.mff.cuni.cz/~pajas/tred/extensions/ is enabled in Setup >> Manage Extensions >> Edit Repositories.

TrEd macro files:

  • tiger/contrib.mac

Stylesheet files:

  • /export/home/pajas/projects/tred-extensions/tiger/stylesheets/Tiger_Corpus
  • /export/home/pajas/projects/tred-extensions/tiger/stylesheets/Tiger_Corpus_alt

Resource files:

  • *[^~]

Script files:

  • split_tiger.xsh
  • tiger2pml.sh
  • tiger2pml.xsl
